content: I would say, “Oh, I like Southern California better than I like it here.” Maybe that’s unacceptable. I think Los Angeles is the greatest city in the world. I’d love to live there; it has the best ethnic food. There’s something about it, the way it’s a cosmopolitan city, sense of openness. Someone once said, “What’s real there is so phony and what’s phony is so real.” It’s always surprising me, and I love their diverse monoculture. My favorite part of this country.
